name: Basicare Maxi Buffer
description:
This cushioned buffer with 3 functions in one perfectly follows the curve of the nail and makes polish fast and easy. Simply files, polishes and buffs.
STEP 1: File (WHITE) across nail in one direction to shape edges and remove ridges.
Step 2: Polish (WHITE) across nail in one direction to have a fine smooth finish.
Step 3: Buff (GREY) across the nail in one direction until as shiny as desired.
Instruction: Remove nail enamel before buffing. Over doing step 1 and 2 might weaken your nails. Step 3 can be repeated as often as you wish.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
